subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick Nash’s goal with less than five minutes left in regulation tied the game, but a newly acquired Pittsburgh forward, Jussi Jokinen, scored against the Rangers’ Henrik Lundqvist for the win.
snippet: Rick Nash’s goal with less than five minutes left in regulation tied the game, but a newly acquired Pittsburgh forward, Jussi Jokinen, scored against the Rangers’ Henrik Lundqvist for the win.
